title: Citi Second Quarter 2012 Fixed Income Investor Review
summary: New York - John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer, and Eric Aboaf, Treasurer, will conduct the Citigroup second quarter 2012 Fixed Income Investor Review at 10 a.m. (EDT) on Friday, July 20, 2012. The review will be available live via webcast and teleconference.
tag-1: Citi Second Quarter 2012 Fixed Income Investor Review
tag-2: New York — John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer, and Eric Aboaf, Treasurer, will conduct the Citigroup second quarter 2012 Fixed Income Investor Review at 10 a.m. (EDT) on Friday, July 20, 2012. The review will be available live via webcast and teleconference.
tag-3: The webcast and presentation materials will be available at https://www.citigroup.com/global/investors/. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available after the call.
tag-4: To dial-in to the live teleconference, please dial:
tag-5: U.S. & Canada: (855) 217-4405 International Callers: (719) 325-2825 Conference code: 548 5837
tag-6: Telephone lines will open at 9:45 a.m. (EDT).
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-8: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
